currency.name: Mixed Currency Detection
currency.rawAnswer: INCONSISTENT: The quote contains mixed currencies. Two items are priced in USD (Software: $50,000 USD and Training: $5,000 USD) while one item is priced in EUR (Services: â‚¬15,000 EUR). All items should be in the same currency for consistency.

currency.rawAnswer:
CONSISTENT

All items are listed in US dollars ($) with consistent formatting and currency symbols.

currency.name: Subtle Currency Mix
currency.rawAnswer: INCONSISTENT: The quote contains three different currencies - US dollars (USD), another amount also listed in US dollars, and British pounds (GBP). While two items are in USD, the UK Office amount is in GBP, making the currency usage inconsistent across the quote.
